in July  Dr PERIOD Dianna Shandy will officially be the new provost on Augustanas campus PERIOD She specialized in anthropology and worked as a former associate provost at Macalester College in St PERIOD Paul MN PERIOD

On March  Augustana College sent out an email announcing the selection of its new provost PERIOD Dr PERIOD Dianna Shandy from Macalester College in St PERIOD Paul Minnesota will begin her position as provost later this.. PERIOD

Provost candidacy a term that may be new to some students but not others is taking place at Augustana College. students do have a say in the decisionmaking process but it is minimal at best PERIOD Students.. PERIOD

Augustana College is nearing the final stages of its search for a new provost PERIOD During the search the college had a selection committee composed of faculty staff board members and a student representative. one.. PERIOD
